review: Cheaper than other options but falls far behind Chromecast and Roku. The Pandora interface (as well as other interfaces) are very basic looking. The apps are limited and there is currently no remote control app available for iphone. Also, you cannot do a desktop/browser share like Chromecast.

review: The Stick itself is really good. Easy to set up and great performance. The problem is the Android app. Can it really be that one must have the Amazon store app also installed and running in order to use the Fire TV control app? How weak!

review: Not as zippy as some claim. Great for $19.99, but not $40. Voice control dicey, as you still have to click OK to launch request. Seems to be an Amazon-o-tron machine for all things Amazon. Does not remember for long, pairing with the Amazon bluetooth controller. A lot of unexpected extra costs for apps and services. But otherwise, a potentially great value.
author: Madfranklin

review: VERY Disappointed with this product.  Remote would not work properly, even after changing the batteries.  Wifi kept disconnecting, even with a strong signal.  There's a reason why Apple products are twice the price - they work!
